name: Extreme Racing on Highway
description: Race through highway traffic in this new endless racing game where you need to push the acceleration and test your car limits and receive money for your rewards and spend them on upgrades & new cars!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 110 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT 730 Storage: 110 MB available space
